instruction: Suggest two resources to learn about the history and impact of digital technologies.
output: Two resources to learn about the history and impact of digital technologies are the book Digital Sovereignty by Gregory P. McGuire and the podcast Ctrl-Walt-Delete by Walt Mossberg and Nilay Patel. Digital Sovereignty takes an in-depth look at the implications of digital technology on society, while Ctrl-Walt-Delete is a podcast discussing the intersection of technology and policy and its effect on our lives.
